unsustainable growth.translation[0].defi: growth that it is not possible to SUSTAIN (=make continue) without causing economic problems
Even the health-care industry, which created 425,000 jobs in the past year, will eventually slow its unsustainable growth as efforts to cut costs take effect.
economic growth that it is not possible to sustain without causing environmental problems
Ever since Malthus forecast a population explosion among the poor, there have been prophecies of unsustainable growth.
